title: PMS 2.0 551 - Thursday Night Football Recap, NFL Week 13 Preview, Kyle Juszczyk, Coach Jason Brown, & Darius Butler
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys welcome Darius Butler to recap last night's Thursday Night Football game between the Cowboys and Saints, and look ahead and give his picks to all of the NFL week 13 games. Joining the show is a 5x Pro Bowler, the FB for the San Francisco 49ers, Kyle Juszczyk. Pat, Kyle, and AJ Hawk chat about the 49ers season this year so far, playing alongside George Kittle, his role in the 49ers offense, and why he likes where the 9ers are at moving forward (1:22:53-1:40:08). Later, Coach Jason Brown joins the Pat and Darius Butler to chat about Brian Kelly leaving Notre Dame for LSU and why this kind of stuff is just going to continue to happen, he gives out his picks for all the Championship games this weekend, and more (1:40:10-1:56:48). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
